SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlottery.event_classes

Class EventViewModel

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlottery.event_classes.EventViewModel
public class EventViewModel extends Object
ViewModel for presenting Event data in the UI. Wraps an Event and adds presentation logic and user-specific state. Handles formatting and UI state without modifying the domain Event.
